name: Chicken & Ducklings
description:
Why did the chicken cross the road? To rescue the ducklings, of course!

Directions
Mouse to move.
Gather the ducklings and bring them home.

Credit
Everything by Kentiya, with a little coding help from Criobite.

Made in less than 72 hours for Ludum Dare 47. I ran out of time toward the end, so there's no sounds or any real art. :(

I didn’t minify the source code, so feel free to look at how marvelously hacked together it is lol.
